column1: '''Foen''' was a tall peak in the center of [[Dorthonion]]
column2: east of [[Rivil's Well]] and west of [[Aeluin]].<ref>{{WJ|Beleriand}}

column1: The name ''Foen'' signified "Long Sight" due to its height.  In a philological fragment of uncertain date it is stated that Dorthonion was also called ''Taur-na-Foen''
In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' appears the [[Noldorin]] word ''foen''
